--------------------
Text: The Federation of Conservative Students (FCS) was the student organisation of the British Conservative Party from the late 1940s to 1986.
Triplets:<The Federation of Conservative Students
1:
--------------------
Text: Federation of Conservative Students:  It was created to act as a bridge between the student movement and the Conservative Party.
Triplets:<Federation of Conservative Students
2:
--------------------
Text: Federation of Conservative Students:  In its final years it became known colloquially as "Maggie's Militant Tendency", in reference to then Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher and to Militant, an entryist group active in the Labour Party at the time.
Triplets:<Federation of Conservative Students
4:
--------------------
Text: Federation of Conservative Students:  The FCS was replaced by the Conservative Collegiate Forum.
